alert.note: Alert for Southern Fairfield; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 27 at 3:39PM EST until February 28 at 10:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Southern Fairfield, Southern New Haven, Southern Middlesex and Southern New London Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the Tuesday morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Southern Fairfield; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London
